name: Excavator
description: A large construction equipment used for digging and moving earth.

name: Bulldozer
description: A powerful tractor equipped with a broad, flat blade for pushing large quantities of soil.

name: Crane
description: A machine designed for lifting and moving heavy materials with a hoist.

name: Forklift
description: A small industrial vehicle with a power-operated forked platform for lifting and moving loads.

name: Backhoe Loader
description: A versatile machine with a digging bucket on the back and a loader on the front.

name: Dump Truck
description: A truck with a container that can be raised to allow materials to be dumped out.

name: Paver
description: A machine used to lay asphalt on roads, parking lots, and other surfaces.

name: Compactor
description: A machine used to compress soil, gravel, or asphalt to increase its density.

name: Skid Steer Loader
description: A compact, maneuverable machine with lift arms that can be fitted with various attachments.
